Node.Description: Open the Storage dimension groups form

Annotation.Description: Before you can use the product change functionality, you must define Storage Dimension Groups, Item Model Groups and Item Groups.
Annotation.Title: Go to Product information management > Setup > Dimension Groups > Storage Dimension groups.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)
Close the EcoResStorageDimensionGroup form

Annotation.Description:
The following fields should be checked in the Storage dimensions list:
1. Site - Active - Physical inventory - Financial inventory - Coverage plan by dimension - For purchase prices - For sales prices
2. Warehouse - Active - Physical inventory - Coverage plan by dimension - For purchase prices - For sales prices
Annotation.Title: Verify the storage dimensions are setup as described in the note. Then close the Storage dimension groups form.

Node.Description: Open the Tracking dimension groups form

Annotation.Title: Go to Product information management > Setup > Dimension groups > Tracking dimension groups.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 3 (zero based index)
Close the EcoResTrackingDimensionGroup form

Annotation.Description:
The following fields should be checked in the Tracking dimensions list:
1. Owner - Physical inventory
2. Inventory prfile - Primary stocking - Physical inventory - Financial inventory
Annotation.Title: Verify the tracking dimensions are setup as described in the note. Then close the Tracking dimension groups form.

Node.Description: Open the Item model groups form

Annotation.Title: Go to Inventory management > Setup > Inventory > Item model groups.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 3 (zero based index)
Toggle the expansion of the Inventory policies section
Close the InventModelGroup form

Annotation.Description:
The following fields should be checked under Cost method and cost recognition:
- Stocked product - Post physical inventory - Post financial inventory - Accrue liability on product receipt
Verify the following fields should be checked under Inventory policies:
- Physical negative inventory - Financial negative inventory
Annotation.Title: Verify the Item model group is setup as described in the note. Then close the Item model groups form.

Node.Description: Open the Item groups form

Annotation.Title: Go to Inventory management > Setup > Inventory > Item groups.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 6 (zero based index)
Close the InventItemGroup form

Annotation.Description:
At least the following account types should have main accounts specified:
1. Packing slip 2. Packing slip offset 3. Issue 4. Consumption 5. Revenue
Annotation.Title: Verify the item group is setup as described in the note. Then close the Item groups form.

Node.Description: Open the All products and product masters form

Annotation.Title: Next, create the product. Go to Product information management > Common > Products > All products and product masters.

Node.Description: Click New
In the Product number field, enter 'Z001'

Annotation.Title: In the Product number field, enter a unique product number, then press tab.

Node.Description: In the Product name field, enter 'Surface Pro'

Annotation.Title: In the Product name field, enter product name, then press tab.

Node.Description: In the Search name field, enter 'Surface Pro'

Annotation.Title: In the Search name field, enter a search name, then press tab.

Node.Description: Click OK
On the action pane, click Product

Annotation.Title: Next, release the product. On the action pane, click Product.

Node.Description: Click Release products
Click Next
In the grid, select row number 12 (zero based index)
Click Next
Click Finish

Annotation.Description: Selected Products: 1 Selected companies: 1 Show infolog on failure: Yes
Annotation.Title: Verify the fields are set as described in the note. Then click Finish.

Node.Description: Expand the Authorized by company fact box

Annotation.Title: Expand the Authorized by company fact box.

Node.Description: Close the EcoResProductDetails form

Annotation.Title: Verify USMF appears in the Authorized by company list. Then close the Product details form.

Node.Description: Close the EcoResProductListPage form
Open the Released products form

Annotation.Title: Next, finalize the released product. Go to Product information management > Common > Products > Released products.

Node.Description: Apply Filter on Item number field with value Z001

Annotation.Title: In the quick filter, enter the Product name for the product you just created, then press enter.

Node.Description: In the grid, mark the selected row
On the action pane, click Product

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Product.

Node.Description: Click Dimension groups to open the drop dialog form
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Storage dimension field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Tracking dimension field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 3 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Click OK
In the grid, click the row

Annotation.Title: Click on the Item number hyperlink.

Node.Description: Click Edit
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Item model group field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 3 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Toggle the expansion of the General section
Toggle the expansion of the Manage costs section
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Item group field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 6 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Toggle the expansion of the Manage costs section
Toggle the expansion of the Sell section
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Unit field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Click Save
On the action pane, click Product

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Product.

Node.Description: Click Validate
Close the EcoResProductDetailsExtended form

Annotation.Title: Read the message to verify that validation was successful. Then close the Produt details form.

Node.Description: Close the EcoResProductPerCompanyListPage form
Open the Released products form

Annotation.Title: Next, set the prices on the product. Go to > Product information management > Common > Products > Released products.

Node.Description: Apply Filter on Item number field with value Z001

Annotation.Title: In the quick filter, enter the Search name for the product, then press enter.

Node.Description: In the grid, click the row

Annotation.Title: Click on the Item number hyperlink.

Node.Description: On the action pane, click Manage inventory

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Manage inventory.

Node.Description: Toggle the expansion of the Manage inventory section
Click Edit
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Unit field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, go to the next page
In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Toggle the expansion of the Manage inventory section
Toggle the expansion of the General section
Toggle the expansion of the Purchase section
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Unit field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Toggle the expansion of the Purchase section
Toggle the expansion of the Manage costs section
In the Price field, enter '500.00'

Annotation.Title: In the Price field, enter a cost price, then press tab.

Node.Description: Toggle the expansion of the Manage costs section
Toggle the expansion of the Sell section
In the Price field, enter '899.00'

Annotation.Title: In the Price field, enter a sell price, then press tab.

Node.Description: Toggle the expansion of the Sell section
Toggle the expansion of the Purchase section
In the Price field, enter '600.00'

Annotation.Title: In the Price field, enter a purchase price, then press tab.

Node.Description: Click Save

Annotation.Title: Whew! You're all done! Click Save.

Node.Description: Close the EcoResProductDetailsExtended form
Close the EcoResProductPerCompanyListPage form
